item.title: Netflix Movie and TV Show Data Analysis
item.description: Netflix and Chill, That famous saying, So netflix has entertaining us for almost a decade now. It has developed a lot. Started as a DVD renting company in USA now it is can be accesed from anywhere in the world. This data descriptive analysis is done to understand the growth(in terms of the collection of Movies and TV shows) of Netflix all around the world.

item.title: Whatsapp Chat Data Analysis
item.description: About The Whole Idea about this analysis, is to Understand about the persons chatting behavior and finding pattern in Whatsapp Messaging In this we will be analysing the chat between two persons From the below chart we can clearly see the number of messages sent each day The Total number of messages were : 5733 Number of messages sent by each persons:
